text.section:
Sec. 33D-37. Municipal and/or County official's responsibilities.
For any application for development action which is located within the shoreline development review boundary, and meets the thresholds described in hereinabove, the municipal or County official responsible for accepting the application for development action, as well as the applicant for the same, shall notify the County staff coordinator in writing at the time of filing the application for development action within the city or County. Said notification from the city or County official shall include a copy of the development action application and a statement certifying that no final development action permit or approval shall be issued by the city or County until the review described herein and in implementing resolutions adopted pursuant to this article has been completed or terminated.
